# copyAppRules()

**Instance Method**

Returns a copy of the app rules currently set in the configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
func copyAppRules() -> [NEAppRule]?
```

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEAppRule] objects, or `nil` if the configuration doesn’t have any app rules.

## Discussion

This method provides read-only access to the configuration’s app rules.

## Managing tunnel configurations

- **loadAllFromPreferences(completionHandler:)**: Read all of the VPN configurations created by the calling app that have previously been saved to the Network Extension preferences.
